sk_desc: Increase your basic Critical Attack Rate.
Increase your basic Critical Attack damage.

Create a chance of blocking attacks with your weapon.
Damage is waived when an attack is successfully blocked.

Spin and inflict damage to all enemies around you with
Level 5 Critical Point. 
Requires a two-handed weapon.

Increase your defense in proportion to your
strength and level.

Reduce all physical and magical damage by 90%. 
Requires a shield. This damage reduction applies to every type
of attack damage without exception.

Increases the movement speed of the Sprint skills; 
does not apply to basic movement speed.

Shower an area with arrows for a 10 second duration.
The skill is canceled if you move during the casting of the skill.
Increase your basic Evasion Point.

Attack a single target with an explosive arrow
that detonates shortly after impact.
Enemies within a certain radius around the target are inflicted
with splashed damage upon explosion.

Stun an enemy, can be used only while Hiding. 
Failing to stun a target reduces your Defense for 5 seconds. 
The Stun effect lasts for a set duration, 
but is canceled if the target receives damage.

Confuse a target. When confused, 
enemy cannot attack you for a set duration, 
but can perform other actions except attack.

Strangle an enemy to inflict damage and cause
the Stun effect.
Can be used only while Hiding.

Inflict damage and increase your Evasion Rate.
Can be used only while Hiding.

Ambush an enemy to inflict fatal wound that causes continuous 
damage for a set duration
Attack the ankle of an enemy to slow down the Movement Speed.

Consume a certain amount of your HP to deliver a powerful attack; 
has high Hit Rate, but can be used only when your HP is 60% or higher.

Cast offensive spells whose powers are not limited
by levels.

Shoot flames whose attack range is limited to the area directly
in front of the caster. This skills effect lasts for a 10 second duration,
but is canceled if you move. Inflicts both initial and continuous damage.

Summon icicles on random areas on the ground that will damage
enemies around you. This skills effect lasts for a 10 second duration,
but is canceled if you move. Inflicts continuous damage.

Shoot a lightning arrow that debuffs a target and inflicts damage. 
If a Lightning buff magic spell was cast on the target, the target receives more damage from this skill. 
This skill also inflicts splashed damage to enemies around the target.
Increase the restorative effect of your healing skills.
Endow invincibility to yourself and a friendly target.

When a targets HP is 30% or lower, 
attack the weak spot to inflict great damage and cause the Stun effect. 
If the target��s HP is higher than 30%, this skill only inflicts damage.
Deliver a powerful blow that inflicts continuous damage.
When a targets HP is 30% or lower, spend all of your energy to deliver a critical blow.
Momentarily intensify your energy to deliver a shower of attacks to an enemy.
Inflict area-effective damage to surrounding enemies.

When attacked, reflect a certain amount of damage
to the attacker for this skills duration.
Attack the armor of an enemy to decrease the Defense for a set duration.
Inflict great damage with dual daggers.
Add more Health Points to your original HP forever
Make the anger point of selected target to zero
Reduce the target's speed of physical attack for a while
